Minimal reprexes for pkgdown issues

issue 1397

See test vignette: https://indrajeetpatil.github.io/minimalReprex/articles/test.html#issue-1397-1

issue 1282 (resolved)

Link: https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown/issues/1282

(Observed at least in Chrome. N.B. Not using netlifly, but rather github pages)

x <- 1 + 2

x
#> [1] 3

issue 1150 (resolved)

Link: https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown/issues/1150

Problems with rendering LaTeX equations in README of pkgdown websites.

This is observed only in Chrome, Internet Explorer, and Edge browsers. No issue with Firefox browser.

This is (partial eta-squared), but is not rendered properly.

Exactly how it is rendered depends on which browser you use, but it is rendered properly only in Firefox.

Somehow this is not an issue when the equations are inside a table:

option-1 option-2
x y
1 2
